iati-activity.reporting-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
iati-activity.title: Liberia, UNMEER : transport of support equipment for actors engaged in the Ebola response
iati-activity.description: The current Ebola outbreak across Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone has claimed more than 6’000 lives out of 13’000 cases across the region. The Multilateral organizations and the Governments’ bodies have beefed up their responses in the affected countries in their respective fields. Human and financial resources needs have increased and governments of affected countries have requested international support. UNMEER is acting as coordinating body and requires in-kind support to be dispatched among Ebola response actors.
iati-activity.participating-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
